Introduction

Jang Dae Hyeon is a South Korean rapper, singer, and songwriter under OUI Entertainment. He competed in the boy group survival show "Produce 101 Season 2." Although he was eliminated in the fifth episode, he debuted as a member of the temporary project group RAINZ on October 12, 2017. After RAINZ disbanded on October 28, 2018, Daehyeon made his solo debut with the digital single "Feel Good."

In 2020, Dae Hyeon was announced as the leader of OUI Entertainment's new boy group WEi. He debuted as the leader of WEi in October 2020 with the mini-album "Identity: First Sight."
